sourcesContent:
import {
    Modal,
    ModalOverlay,
    ModalContent,
    ModalHeader,
    ModalFooter,
    ModalBody,
    ModalCloseButton,
    Button,
    Image,
    Grid,
    GridItem,
    FormControl,
    FormLabel,
    Select,
    useDisclosure
  } from '@chakra-ui/react'

  export default function ClothingModal(props: any) {
    //console.log(props.isOpen)
    return (
      <>
        <Button onClick={props.onOpen}>Open Modal</Button>
  
        <Modal isOpen={true} onClose={props.onClose} size="full">
          <ModalOverlay />
          <ModalContent>
            <ModalHeader>Add Clothing</ModalHeader>
            <ModalCloseButton />
            <ModalBody>
              <Grid
                h='100%'
                templateRows='repeat(2, 1fr)'
                templateColumns='repeat(5, 1fr)'
                gap={4}
              >
                <GridItem rowSpan={2} colSpan={3} bg='transparent'>
                  <Image
                    src={"/" + props.clothing?.image}
                    alt={"Clothing " + props.clothing?.id}
                    borderRadius='lg'
                  />
                </GridItem>
                <GridItem colSpan={4} bg='transparent'>
                  <FormControl>
                    <FormLabel>Type</FormLabel>
                    <Select placeholder='Select option'>
                      <option value='option1'>Option 1</option>
                      <option value='option2'>Option 2</option>
                      <option value='option3'>Option 3</option>
                    </Select>
                  </FormControl>
                </GridItem>
                <GridItem colSpan={4} bg='transparent' />
              </Grid>
            </ModalBody>
  
            <ModalFooter>
              <Button colorScheme='blue' mr={3} onClick={props.onClose}>
                Close
              </Button>
              <Button variant='ghost'>Secondary Action</Button>
            </ModalFooter>
          </ModalContent>
        </Modal>
      </>
    )
  }
